mvc.config.enable_merging.desc: When enabled, this option allows the mod to merge multiple resource packs that modify "Item Definitions" (such as renaming items, changing conditions, etc.). This helps to ensure that all desired modifications from different resource packs are applied simultaneously.
mvc.config.enable_pack_crash_fix.desc: When enabled, the game will ignore duplicate selection cases in "Item Definitions" to prevent crashes and ensure that other items in the resource pack remain functional.
mvc.config.enable_debug.desc: When enabled, the mod will save the generated "Item Definitions" files to a debug folder for inspection and troubleshooting.
mvc.config.rp.hand_animation_on_swap.des: Enables/Disables the "hand_animation_on_swap" parameter for all items
mvc.config.rp.oversized_in_gui.desc: Enables/Disables the "oversized_in_gui" parameter for all items
mvc.config.reload_textures.desc: Reloads the resource packs to ensure that the debug items appear in the folder.
